name: 艾萨克·萨维尼翁
name_full: 艾萨克·萨维尼翁 Isaac Saviñón
introduction: Isaac Saviñón is an actor, film producer, executive producer, writer, and creative.He was born on December 16 in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic, and from a young age he was drawn to an artistic life, participating in every artistic expression in which he could express himself.For more than two decades, Isaac Saviñón has been engaged in music and television, from major television series such as Mango TV's Panky Los Manolos and blockbuster radio programs like "Cual es tu versión" to becoming the lead singer for his award-winning pop rock band, "Metropolitan". His accolades are numerous, spanning a tremendous career of creative worth fueled only by passion and talent, but he is now taking a long-awaited leap in his career: making movies.Thus far, his efforts on this new path have been highly recognized as those of a brilliant actor portraying iconic characters and being in enormously successful and award-winning films, which has allowed him to be the executive producer of his own films owing to his initial success.Furthermore, for his professionalism, popularity, and widely recognized image throughout the Dominican Republic, Latin America, and the Hispanic part of the United States, Isaac Saviñón has been the face of prestigious brands and/or products recognized worldwide, such as Pepsi, Brahma, Adidas, Gold's Gym, and Sony. From 2012 until 2015, Saviñón was an ambassador for MTV's Staying Alive, a non-profit initiative that strives to educate Hispanic adolescents about the HIV/AIDS virus.
